title: You have been disconnected from chat.Attempting to Reconnect..

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I can't see my friend's list at all.. But I can play and Browse through the store? Anyway to fix this? Thanks.

replies.body: Its the same for me and ive tried all things i could find on the forum...

The client has a variety of different services that you need to connect to, pvp.net being one of them for chat.  Try our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings in case that might be the culprit.

Otherwise, the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix things up.
